ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are very much grateful to Nguyen Thi Thanh Thuy, Institute of Applied Materials Science at Ho Chi Minh city for their valuable help in GC-MS analysis of the essential oils. Again, authors are thankful to Bui My Linh for provide plants authenticated by a plant taxonomist from the Department of Botany, Ho Chi Minh University of Medicine and Pharmacy.
